frame.name: Noncombatant
frame.definition:
<def-root>This frame contains words that denote people who are not participating in a military <fen>Conflict</fen>.
<ex><fex name="Person">Jones</fex> <m>was</m> a <t>noncombatant</t> <fex name="con">in WWII</fex>.</ex>
<ex>News comes in every day of <t><fex name="Person">civilians</fex></t> getting caught up in military operations.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Origin
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Origin</fen> is the place where the <fen>Person</fen> was born or lived a salient part of her or his life.</def-root>

FE.name: Person
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Person</fen> is a non-participant in a <fen>Conflict</fen>.
<ex>Don't shoot -- <fex name="Person">I</fex>'m just a <t>civilian</t>!</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Persistent_characteristic
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Persistent_characteristic</fen> is a physiological characteristic or personality trait of the <fen>Person</fen> which is concieved of as persisting over time.</def-root>

FE.name: Descriptor
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Descriptor</fen> is a temporary condition of the <fen>Person</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Age
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Age</fen> is the length of time the <fen>Person</fen> has been alive.</def-root>

FE.name: Ethnicity
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Ethnicity</fen> is the religious, racial, national, socio-economic or cultural group to which the <fen>Person</fen> belongs.</def-root>

FE.name: Context_of_acquaintance
FE.definition: <def-root>An expression indicating the context with which the <fen>Person</fen> is associated.</def-root>

FE.name: Conflict
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Conflict</fen> in which the <fen>Person</fen> is not fighting.
<ex><fex name="Person">Jones</fex> <m>was</m> a <t>noncombatant</t> <fex name="con">in WWII</fex>.</ex></def-root>

lexUnit.name: non-combatant.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a non-participant in a military conflict.

lexUnit.name: civilian.n
lexUnit.definition: FN: a person not a member of the armed forces.
